game

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages and tracks the game.
    Author:
    Sean Lewis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameManager()
      Starts the GameManager, reading in all level data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Level getCurrentLevel()
      Returns the current level for the game.
      int getCurrentLevelSwings()
      Returns the total number of swings taken in the current level.
      int getLevelNumber()
      Returns the current level number.
      int getLevelSwings(int levelNumber)
      Returns the number of swings taken in a specific level number.
      int getNumberOfLevels()
      Returns, excluding the menu level, the number of levels in the game.
      int getTotalSwings()
      Returns the total number of swings taken in the game.
      boolean isGameOver()
      Returns if the game has been finished yet.
      boolean loadSave(java.io.File file)
      Loads a file into the game.
      boolean nextLevel()
      Loads the next level into the memory.
      void swingTaken()
      Tells the GameManager a swing has been taken by the player.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameManager

        public GameManager()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the GameManager, reading in all level data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • getLevelNumber

        public int getLevelNumber()
        Returns the current level number. The menu level is defined as level 0, and the first level is defined as level 1.
        Returns:
        the current level number

      • getNumberOfLevels

        public int getNumberOfLevels()
        Returns, excluding the menu level, the number of levels in the game.
        Returns:
        the number of levels

      • getTotalSwings

        public int getTotalSwings()
        Returns the total number of swings taken in the game.
        Returns:
        total swings taken

      • getCurrentLevelSwings

        public int getCurrentLevelSwings()
        Returns the total number of swings taken in the current level.
        Returns:
        swings taken in this level

      • getLevelSwings

        public int getLevelSwings(int levelNumber)
        Returns the number of swings taken in a specific level number.
        Parameters:
        levelNumber - a parameter
        Returns:
        number of swings taken in a level

      • getCurrentLevel

        public Level getCurrentLevel()
        Returns the current level for the game.
        Returns:
        the current game level

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Returns if the game has been finished yet.
        Returns:
        if the game is over

      • nextLevel

        public boolean nextLevel()
        Loads the next level into the memory.
        Returns:
        true if the next level was loaded, false is no more levels exist.

      • swingTaken

        public void swingTaken()
        Tells the GameManager a swing has been taken by the player. Updates swing information.

      • loadSave

        public boolean loadSave(java.io.File file)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Loads a file into the game.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read from
        Returns:
        if the file was successfully loaded
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file could not be read from
